sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Condominium Advisory Council Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Condominium Advisory Council Act.

sections.heading: Dissolution of Council. The Council shall be dissolved 30 days after it reports its findings and recommendations to the Governor and General Assembly.
sections.text: Dissolution of Council. The Council shall be dissolved 30 days after it reports its findings and recommendations to the Governor and General Assembly.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
